name: VRobot (itch)
description:
A small demo where the player is seated in the center of the scene, across a companion VRobot.

The player will see a little bit of what can be done with VR, without having to be afraid of motion sickness or jump scares.

Recommend high end machine. Was made with a Nvidia 980 card and Oculus DK2.

Available for PC and (not so recommended) for Mac.
